title: BCD-watch: New Baselines Report (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 21 July 2025 through Monday, 28 July 2025🔗

15 new universal implementations

API

  1. api ➞ RTCStatsReport ➞ type_candidate-pair ➞ responsesReceived

items.content_html:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 30 June 2025 through Monday, 7 July 2025🔗

6 new universal implementations

API

  1. api ➞ HTMLElement ➞ beforetoggle_event ➞ dialog_elements
    Added to Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines

    Added to Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines
